articles.title: Google will stop charging search providers for chance to be Android default in Europe - The Verge
articles.description: Google is changing how its Android search engine choice screen works in Europe, following complaints from rivals about its pay-to-play model. It will no longer charge to be included, and it’ll give a choice of up to 12 services.
articles.content:
Following complaints about its pay-to-play model
The screen will now show up to 12 providers.
